Sencast
  • auxil
  • View page source

auxilÔÉÅ

utils.auxil.authenticate_cds_anc(env)ÔÉÅ

If the configuration contains username and password for CDS anc data api, create ~/.cdsapirc containing these credentials

utils.auxil.authenticate_earthdata_anc(env)ÔÉÅ

If the configuration contains username and password for NASA anc data api, create ~/.netrc and ~/.urs_cookies (Linux) or ~/_netrc (Windows) containing these credentials

utils.auxil.error(file, e)ÔÉÅ
utils.auxil.gpt_subprocess(cmd, log_path, attempts=1, timeout=False)ÔÉÅ
utils.auxil.init_hindcast(env_file, params_file)ÔÉÅ

Initialize a sencast run with an environment file and a parameters file.

utils.auxil.load_environment(env_file=None, env_path='/home/runnalja/git/sencast/utils/../environments')ÔÉÅ

Load the environment configuration from a ini file. If no ini file is provided, it tries to automatically pick one.

utils.auxil.load_params(params_file, params_path='/home/runnalja/git/sencast/utils/../parameters')ÔÉÅ

Read the parameters from a ini file.

utils.auxil.load_properties(properties_file, separator_char='=', comment_char='#')ÔÉÅ

Read a properties file into a dict.

utils.auxil.load_wkt(wkt_file, wkt_path='/home/runnalja/git/sencast/utils/../wkt')ÔÉÅ

Read the perimeter from a given wkt file.

utils.auxil.log(file, text, indent=0, blank=False)ÔÉÅ
utils.auxil.log_output(res, log_path, indent=2)ÔÉÅ
utils.auxil.set_gpt_cache_size(env)ÔÉÅ

Set the GPT cache size, if not set.
